blur_detection.description: The receipt shows clear, sharp text with well-defined characters and good edge definition.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text clarity is excellent for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: Strong black text on white thermal paper background provides excellent contrast for readability.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvements needed; current contrast is optimal for data extraction.

glare_identification.description: No significant glare or reflections are present on the receipt surface.
glare_identification.recommendation: Continue to photograph receipts under similar lighting conditions.

water_stains.description: No water damage, discoloration, or staining is visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: Continue to keep receipts dry and protected from liquids.

tears_or_folds.description: Minor curling of the thermal paper is visible but does not impact text legibility.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: Consider flattening receipts before scanning, though current condition is acceptable.

cut_off_detection.description: All edges of the receipt are visible with no content appearing to be cut off.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Continue capturing full receipt images with similar framing.

missing_sections.description: Receipt appears complete with all typical sections including header, line items, and total visible.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as all receipt components are present.

obstructions.description: A finger is visible holding the receipt but does not obscure any important information.
obstructions.recommendation: If possible, use a flat surface or document holder to avoid fingers in future scans.
